data.text:
@Dan_Marsh_ @JesseKellyDC Aaand you failed.  You failed to comprehend or acknowledge I don't watch Fox, as it would've derailed the Alinskyite strawman that seemed awesome in your head.  And, after being the one to bring up Carlson, you failed to even make your case against him per my challenge.

Failure.

@afa1776 @JesseKellyDC Hahahaha
"Sure, Tucker was washing Putin's balls with his mouth but that was 2 years ago!!!"
Right up into the invasion, your favorite white supremacist trust fund heir was doing PR for Putin.
Sorry you're not man enough to admit the truth.

@crowwashere @MikeMoo61299704 @JesseKellyDC Well, the mitigating action that should taken is to ramp up US production, & if cutting off Russian oil forces #DementiaJoe to do that, I'll suffer in the short-term for that. If however, they try to manipulate it try to force us to go green, then no.

@Dan_Marsh_ @JesseKellyDC 1.  That's not the video I referenced.  Duh.

2.  That's from 2019, doof.   Show me where that's his current position in the current context or take your unintentional comedy show elsewhere.

@afa1776 @JesseKellyDC Try again, you poor deluded dupe.
"Why shouldn't I root for Russia? Which I am!"
Go ahead! Spin that as not being pro-Putin!
https://t.co/urMiKqWCg2

@Dan_Marsh_ @JesseKellyDC You watch Fox News and you're calling *me* clueless? 

Anyway, the video I saw that people were freaking out about was isolationist -- paraphrasing, "Putin/Russia hasn't knocked on my door to rob me or take my gun or stick a needle in me" -- not pro-Putin.
@afa1776 @JesseKellyDC Tucker Carlson has made a nest up Putin's butt, clueless.
